name: MAKRANTIA
description:
STORY Makrantia (Planet)

Makrantia has hosted many races throughout its history and witnessed the wars between them. The history of the planet is written in blood and grief. City centers are dominated by a strong regime, but in the countryside there are no laws. The strong crush the weak.

Game Story

Arriving at the dungeon where Laurel has been held for a while, Marvin draws Laurel's attention. Marvin is not an elf like Laurel, but Laurel realizes that without her power there is no way out of this prison. The short-term friendship they would make to escape was about to turn into a completely different adventure.

Marvin (Character)

Growing up in an orphanage, Marvin was the only child to survive the fire there.She spent the rest of her life with 2 friends she met on the streets, but a stranger wanted to kill Marvin for her lineage that even she didn't know about. One night, the hut she lived in caught fire. When Marvin went out, she saw her friends killed by several men and  had to flee the city without even mourning. aught by slave traders on her journey, Marvin had taken the first step towards the journey that her destiny had prepared for her, even if she didn't realize it. 

Laurel (Character)

Born deep within the sacred forest of Makrantia, Laurel had a peaceful life and loved her forest. But she wanted more and was hungry for knowledge. It might take some time to get qualified enough to get out of the woods, after all, it was dangerous out there and the fastest way out was to get stronger. After endless training, Laurel became the youngest master elf mage. The elven king, who trusted Laurel very much, gave her a very special mission, but there were some problems where she went and she was caught by the slave traders. Laurel was about to make choices that would decide Makrantia's fate.

CONTROLLER *This game must be played with two people Marvin Controller Gamepad
  • Left stick- Move
  • Y Button- Air Slash
  • X Button- Sword Attack
  • A Button(Double click)- Tornado
  • B Button- Aura
Laurel Controller Keyboard&Mouse
  • E- Speed Buff
  • Q- Flame Area
  • W + 1- Flame Throw
  • W + 2- Heal
  • W + 3- Teleport
  • LMB- Move/Arcan Throw/Aim
